channel.title: Falador
channel.description:
well after corey and lilxcj starting varrock; I decided to start Falador. right now until i have some work done on it; the only one there will be me, and my irl friends(bro, cousin, and best friend)--i may look for someone willing to help out also(pm me. ill have to get to know you to know you are trustworthy, or if have ppl who will vouch for you then maybe). we will work out a government, and system of order--possibly similar to varrocks. I hope this will be a nice and fun place to live. I wont be able to be on a whole lot to build so the progress will probably be slower than varrock.
This is going to be a work in progress just like varrock. Sorry i dont have a nice organized page like lilxcj has but im trying to write this quick and its 5 am.
Edit: Progress: ~<7% of building materials needed(~<3500/50552). Areas built: ~2.5% of area built(~1/40).
Estimates exclude structures, area, and add-ons built after the construction of the castle.

item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

Rules and postions coming soon. Construction status updated.

item.title: Falador
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:8, topic:377582”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=473480.msg3462289#msg3462289 date=1294570062]
well i take lummy then so please don’t build it
there are plenty of other city’s available
[/quote]

I didn’t build Varrock to look like Varrock. I named my city varrock because I used to hang out in varrock in runescape.[/quote]i’m gonna do that too
making it like runescape would be real stealing
just the names

Read full topic

item.title: Falador
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:5, topic:377582”]Now really, no one here invented the idea of a minecraft city, so let’s not talking about rights

Have fun making it, let’s hope it turns out good.[/quote][quote=“LilXCj, post:4, topic:377582”]It’s not like I’m going to sue him via Minecraft court. (which actually, would be a fun thing to make).

ok thx. i hope it turns out good too.

Ideas are ideas, even if they are “stolen”. It’s not like I’m going to accuse him of being unoriginal because there is usually only one way to do things.[/quote]

Read full topic

It’s not like I’m going to sue him via Minecraft court. (which actually, would be a fun thing to make).

item.title: Falador
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

how did i steal his idea? i asked him if i could build falador. its not going to be just like his. he pretty much came up with the idea. i take no credit in the idea, just building a new village to live; since we are going to have pvp monday. i dont think it will be ready by then, though. the jobs and bank will be different but may be based off his idea. ill ask him everytime if its alright to use one of his ideas.

Read full topic

item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

you rlly stole his idea

Read full topic
